ovdesc.p: This application is used to store the value of any stock index, for example the FT 100 Index or the Nikkei Index.
There is a history version of this file called SC.HIST.INDICES which will be updated at month end. These two files can be used for performance comparisons with portfolio performances.

desc.p: Field holding a Security Number identifier which can be used in any automatic feed to update this file.
Field holding the value of the Stock Index.
This is an identifier to the Security Index this record contains the value for. An example might be FTSE-100 for the Financial Times London 100 index.
Field holding the date the value of the index was last updated.
This together with the rate field give the value for the stock index as at a particular date.
Optional input standard T24 date field.
Multi-valued free format field used to record a description of the index.
